rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0001
rows.name: Then...the old tales have come to pass...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0002
rows.name: Even the Vita...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Even the Great One's own vessel, bested by these primates...
It's absolutely sickening![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0004
rows.name: The bigger they come, the harder they fail.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0005
rows.name: We came here to ensure the survival of the human race.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0006
rows.name: The will to live is stronger than the will to destroy, Luxaar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0006_2
rows.name: That is why you lost here today.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0007
rows.name: If only...I could see Him...the Great One...one last—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0008
rows.name: Is it...over?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0009
rows.name: Sure looks that way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0010
rows.name: Lieutenant, we did it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0011
rows.name: First, Dance of Victory! Then, Linly's victory feast![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0012
rows.name: Sure Tatsu, I'm game.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0013
rows.name: Let us dance up a storm in any port![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_JNK0010
rows.name: Celebrate

rows.label: xs12080100_SEL0011
rows.name: Revel in your victory.

rows.label: xs12080100_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: xs12080100_SEL0021
rows.name:
Ask Elma to continue her explanation
from before the battle.

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0014
rows.name: You all fought hard to earn this. You, Lin...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0015
rows.name: Everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0016
rows.name: Elma forgot Tatsu! Tatsu was key player![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0017
rows.name: Sorry Tatsu, I just assumed that was a given.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0018
rows.name: Oh, please...it was nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0019
rows.name: Pfft, yeah, in your case, it really WAS nothing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0020
rows.name: Colonel, if I may?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0021
rows.name:
Before the battle, what was that you were saying?
About the whole truth?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0022
rows.name: Right... Let me explain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0023
rows.name:
Hey, come on, lighten up!
We just finally beat the Ganglion![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Tatsu even wants to be part of the victory feast!
Isn't that right, Tatsu?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0025
rows.name: W-w-wait! When Linly say "part of the feast..."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0026
rows.name: Yeah. I mean we'll all eat you, in celebration.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0027
rows.name: No-no-no-no![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0028
rows.name: Tatsu want nothing to do with Linly's feast! Nothing at all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0029
rows.name: Oh, okay. We'll just eat without you then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0030
rows.name: B-but...wait! No! Linly know what Tatsu means![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0031
rows.name: I'm sure you two will work it out somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0032
rows.name: Anyway, getting back to the conversation from earlier...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0033
rows.name: So—that big machine hanging above us...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0034
rows.name:
I've never seen one anywhere near that size,
but it LOOKS like a seventh-generation quantum mainframe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0035
rows.name: That's exactly right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0036
rows.name:
It's by far the most technologically advanced computer
humanity has ever created,[ST:page p1=90 ]in terms of both speed and capacity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0037
rows.name:
It's also the foundation for the Earthlife Colonization Project.
It's where all your consciousnesses have been recorded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0038
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0039
rows.name: Elma... You mean...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0040
rows.name:
Yes, that's what I mean.
And not just everyone in New LA—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0041
rows.name:
The essence of all 20 million humans
we brought with us from Earth are there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0042
rows.name:
Including all their memories, their genetic makeup—
anything and everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0043
rows.name:
It's all been digitized and stored away in the Core,
right up there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0044
rows.name: Then...what about our bodies?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0045
rows.name: You mean the originals all this data was sampled from?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0046
rows.name: They were destroyed along with the Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0053
rows.name: Then...wait...you mean we're already dead?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0054
rows.name: You could see it that way. Or you could see it differently.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0055
rows.name:
The bodies you were born with, and all the chemicals
and organs that created and stored your thoughts, are gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0057
rows.name:
But your SELF has lived on as data,
from the moment the project scanned your minds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0058
rows.name: It's all been stored here as part of the long-term plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0059
rows.name: Until it could be moved back into a real body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0060
rows.name: What real bodies?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0061
rows.name: I'll show you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0062
rows.name:
Those capsules represent a sample of all
the genetic material that could be found on Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0063
rows.name: Exodus was always about more than just fleeing the planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0064
rows.name:
Ships like the White Whale were designed as arks, to carry
the building blocks of all life on Earth to the next world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0065
rows.name: Ark? You mean...as in, like, Noah's Ark?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0066
rows.name: Yes, that's exactly what I mean.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0067
rows.name:
A last-ditch effort to save all living things,
that they might someday flourish again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0068
rows.name: This entire chamber is filled with protoplasmic fluid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0069
rows.name:
You see how it works—it can regenerate life
from the genetic data stored above.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0070
rows.name: Including humans? All of us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0071
rows.name:
Once your bodies are cultivated,
your present memory can be transferred back in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0072
rows.name:
Everything you've felt or done in your mim will be
carried over seamlessly, without any loss in continuity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0073
rows.name:
You mean, we'll have our bodies back?
...It sounds too good to be true![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0074
rows.name: It IS too good to be true.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0075
rows.name: Our bodies were REAL. We were BORN in them...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0076
rows.name:
And now you just snap your fingers and BAM,
we get new ones?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0077
rows.name:
Is that even right?! It doesn't feel like it.
Are we even humans anymore?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0078
rows.name: Transferring our memories...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0079
rows.name:
Playing musical chairs with our bodies...
Where do you draw the line?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0080
rows.name:
How do I know I'll be the same person I was
wherever I end up?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0081
rows.name: To some extent, you won't be. But then, you never were.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0082
rows.name:
On a cellular level,
we all wake up as slightly different people every day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0083
rows.name:
It's only because of the continuity of consciousness
that we even perceive ourselves as ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0084
rows.name: It’s all a fragile illusion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0085
rows.name:
And until anyone proves we all have a soul,
one better left to the philosophers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0086
rows.name: You're right to have doubts, Doug.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0087
rows.name:
This was the single biggest debate
among the ECP board...and rightly so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0088
rows.name: So then—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0089
rows.name:
We did talk about putting actual bodies in stasis.
We seriously considered it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0090
rows.name:
In fact, some of the other projects took that path...but they
would've been lucky if their ships were able to hold 50,000.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0092
rows.name: The Exodus arks were different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0093
rows.name:
Enough data and materials to revive 20 million people,
perfectly preserved on each and every ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0094
rows.name:
The board weighed all the pros and cons, the ethical issues
and dangers of violating the natural order of things...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0095
rows.name: But this is what they landed on. And I agreed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0096
rows.name:
So when Lao said our flesh burned away with the Earth...
he wasn't just being dramatic.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0097
rows.name: No, he must have discovered the truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0098
rows.name: Which only made his pain worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0099
rows.name:
That the same people who passed over his family
were keeping this all secret.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0100
rows.name: It's no wonder he snapped... Poor bastard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0101
rows.name: But even so, he never said anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0102
rows.name: You know why, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0103
rows.name: Because of you, Lin. He didn't want to see you lose hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0104
rows.name:
In the end, he led us here, right?
In the end, maybe he accepted it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0105
rows.name: I'd like to think he did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0106
rows.name: Maybe so.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0107
rows.name:
The ultimate hope with Project Exodus was that
mimeosomes could escort this system to a safe new home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0108
rows.name:
Lay down the foundations of a new society and
basically "reboot" humanity. Continue where it left off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0109
rows.name:
Despite everything we've been through, with the Ganglion
and everything else, that dream is almost a reality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0111
rows.name:
I know how you feel, Doug. And you can call it
whatever you like...but I need to see this through.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0112
rows.name:
I'll have to live with my decision.
But I GET to live with my decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0113
rows.name: What about you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0114
rows.name: Sorry, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0115
rows.name:
This is just...a lot to take in.
To be honest, I still have big concerns...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0116
rows.name:
but I can see you're following the path you believed in,
from the choices you were given.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0117
rows.name: So what the hell. I made it this far in a tin can—why not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0118
rows.name: Yeah... Me too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0119
rows.name: Tatsu three![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0120
rows.name: Uh, Tatsu? This has nothing to do with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0121
rows.name: What? No?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0122
rows.name: Sorry, Tatsu a little lost, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0123
rows.name:
If it mean friends get to make more Hom Hom,
Tatsu gladly approve![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0124
rows.name: Hom Hom? The hell is that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs12080100_MSG0125
rows.name: Hmm? Uh...Tatsu have no idea![ST:wait ]
